column2: Part I
He lived in Panama, Pennsylvania.
He had never been "captain" of anything except the Crescent Volunteer Fire Company, but he owned the title because he collected rents, wrote insurance, and meddled with lawsuits.
column3: He had never been "captain" of anything except the Crescent Volunteer Fire Company, but he owned the title because he collected rents, wrote insurance, and meddled with lawsuits.

column2: He was aimlessly industrious, crotchety but kind, and almost quixotically honest.
column3: He was aimlessly industrious, crotchety but kind, and almost quixotically honest.

column2: Her mouth was as kind as her spirited eyes, but it drooped.
column3: Her mouth was as kind as her spirited eyes, but it drooped.

column2: Not that she wanted to be a teacher!
column3: Not that she wanted to be a teacher!

column2: Of course she would teach!
Una was facing the feminist problem, without knowing what the word "feminist" meant.
column3: Una was facing the feminist problem, without knowing what the word "feminist" meant.

column2: This she knew scientifically.
Una crossed blessed matrimony off the list as a commercial prospect.
column3: Una crossed blessed matrimony off the list as a commercial prospect.

column2: While she trudged home--a pleasant, inconspicuous, fluffy-haired young woman, undramatic as a field daisy--a cataract of protest poured through her.
column3: While she trudged home-a pleasant, inconspicuous, fluffy haired young woman, undramatic as a field daisy-a cataract of protest poured through her.

column2: There was no place to which she could flee.
column3: There was no place to which she could flee.

column2: Poor, poor little mother, working away happy up there, and I've got to go and scold you, Una agonized.
column3: Poor, poor little mother, working away happy up there, and I've got to go and scold you, Una agonized.

column2: She pounced on it.
Mr. and Mrs. Albert Sessions, of Panama, had gone to New York.
column3: mr and mrs Albert Sessions, of Panama, had gone to New York.

column2: They liked New York.
Mumsie! she cried, "we're going to New York!
column3: Mumsie! she cried, "we're going to New York!

column2: Is it the letter from Emma Sessions?
column3: Is it the letter from Emma Sessions?

column2: She suggested it, but we are going up independent.
column3: She suggested it, but we are going up independent.

column2: But can we afford to?...	But can we afford to?...
